page.title: 08ST JUDE'S CHURCH
page.content: St.Jude's church was built in 1859 that makes it 136 years old.They have a church choir with 16 people,each Sunday they have about 160 people coming to the family communion service at 9.30am and about 100 people take communion.The vicar who is there now is Reverend Faulkner,he has been there for 20 years.A long time ago there was seating for 530 people but now there is seating for only 200.In St.Jude's church 550 couples have been married in 20 years and most of them ask for a choir.35 sidesmen take it in turns to do the services,they help the vicar to break the bread and water the wine and distribute it.St.Jude's church have ecumenical services on a Sunday evening at 6.30pm,once a month.The altar in St.Jude's has been moved forwards for the congregation because they couldn't hear properly before.
